name: SupportSethAndGarcia
_source: speak;Seth;Sir Garcia.|Your fighting form remains impeccable, despite your years of retirement.|Fantastic...|How I admire you.
speak;Garcia;No, General Seth, I still have a long way to go.|I've lost so much time.
speak;Garcia;No, no honorifics.|I gave up my title years ago so I could raise my son.|I'm old and rusty, General.|The man I am now is not fit for such fine company.
speak;Garcia;But listen, General.|I'm not finished yet!
speak;Garcia;I'm telling you...|I'm not yet done!|This is not the end of me!
speak;Seth;...He has a warrior's heart.|Is it pride that keeps him from accepting his limitations?|I'm afraid that we have awakened an incredible warrior.
speak;Seth;Garcia.|Did you come all this way to talk to me?|I'm grateful.|Thank you.
speak;Garcia;Don't make a fuss.|Might give me second thoughts before I do it again.
speak;Garcia;Heh...|You know, you remind me of myself as a young man.
speak;Seth;Back when you were in Renais?
speak;Garcia;That's right.|Oh, I was so ambitious then, focused on proving myself in battle.|His Majesty commended my valor many times, he did.

speak;Seth;His Majesty always watched over us.|Hardworking soldiers received words of praise to drive them to greater glories.|The lazy ones, he spurred to action, giving them a reason to improve...|He was a great king.|He earned the trust and respect of his people.
speak;Garcia;...What a loss we've all suffered.
speak;Seth;When Castle Renais fell, it was all I could do to save Princess Eirika.|I've never felt so powerless in all my time as a knight...|...I was mortified.

speak;Garcia;...I'm sorry.|I wasn't blaming you for King Fado's death.|I am the one who surrendered his duty to live a carefree life with his son.|I have no right to cast blame on anyone but myself...
speak;Seth;Garcia, you needn't feel that way.|You're fighting for Renais again, at the side of her crown prince and princess!|There's no shame in that.
speak;Seth;If you are still true to our late king, then let's win this war together.|And together, we shall visit His Majesty's tomb to report our victory!
speak;Seth;You seem much recovered from your poor spirits the other day.|In fact, you seem quite energetic!
speak;Garcia;I've finally accepted that I'm only ever truly alive when I'm fighting!
speak;Seth;Ah, now that is the great Garcia I remember from my youth!|Yes, all hesitation is gone from your face.|You're in rare form!
speak;Garcia;Yes, and that hesitation is gone for good, I dare say.|Except...
speak;Garcia;To tell you the truth...I am not ashamed of the life I've lived.|I'm not sorry that I abandoned my old life to raise my son.
speak;Garcia;That decision made me who I am now.|It's time I embraced both of these aspects of my past.
speak;Garcia; I can only say this in hindsight, but...|It is not so bad to have a family.
speak;Seth;Garcia, I can see it in your eyes.|You don't need to tell me.
speak;Garcia;Heh...|I see!|Well then, Seth.|There is only one solution for it!|You should marry!|It will do you good to have a family to go home to.
speak;Seth;Ah, Garcia...|You may be right, but I'm afraid it will take me some time to get there...
